subject-English: There is a structure to measure cross channel effectiveness.
題目-Chinese: 公司已設立各通路單獨的績效衡量指標。

subject-English: There are seamless customer journeys across channels and along the entire customer lifecycle.
題目-Chinese: 公司已提供無縫接軌的跨通路整合，並隨著客戶生命周期機動調整客戶個人化服務。

subject-English: Mobile channels are used to promote products and services to customers.
題目-Chinese: 數位通路已成為推廣產品的重要媒介。亦即，透過數位通路知悉本產品的營收，超過總營收的50%(含)以上。

subject-English: The customer is presented with relevant product offerings based on their behaviour or transaction history.
題目-Chinese: 公司已依據客戶的行為或交易紀錄，來提供產品推薦。

subject-English: Customer service agents will have access to the same single customer view, seeing the complete product holding and history.
題目-Chinese: 與客戶接觸的前線人員，能獲得相同的單一客戶觀點資訊，看到完整的產品清單與交易紀錄。
